channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Concrete fence post hanging into the road, 27th January
item.description:
There is a concrete fence post hanging into the road if a tall vehicle goes down the road it could end up hitting it

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mottingham Lane, Mottingham, Greater London

item.description:

item.title: Trip hazard causing a fall, injury and damaged property, 27th January
item.description:
The footpath is raised (tree roots?) which caused tripping and a fall. This resulted in cuts and bruises and broken spectacles. It seems the hazard has been uncovered as vegetation has been cut back

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crossway, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Manhole cover missing, danger to pedestrians., 26th January
item.description:
I found out the manhole cover missing and the hole is about 30-40 cm deep. People can easily miss that and it could cause bad falls leading to fractures or even more serious health hazards.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38, Ferntower Road, Highbury, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 26th January
item.description:
Has been here since before Christmas 2025, reporting again. Fly tipping on first floor Havil street flats. The block near Southampton way, with slope, backing onto Sedgmoor.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sedgmoor Place, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter all over the stairs still, 26th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sedgmoor Place, Camberwell, Greater London

item.title: Loose manhole, 26th January
item.description:
Hi I reported this on 19.1 2026 but I was told later that day nothing was wrong then on sat 24th it had a barrier around it and today 26th the barrier has been removed no work appears to have been done ref nos8716966 can you please let me know what is happening the noise is really loud
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Perry Street, Crayford, Greater London
